rows.translation: When the sky is split open

bismillah.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.

rows.translation: and gives ear to its Lord as it should.
When the earth is spread out
and throws out what is in it, emptying itself,
and gives ear to its Lord as it should.

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَـٰقِيهِ
rows.translation: O man! You are labouring toward your Lord laboriously, and you will encounter Him.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kad-ḥan famulāqīh

rows.translation: Then, as for him who is given his record [of deeds] in his right hand,
he will receive an easy reckoning,
and he will return to his folks joyfully.

rows.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
rows.translation: But as for him who is given his record from behind his back,
rows.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warā-a ẓahrih

rows.translation: he will pray for annihilation
and enter the Blaze.
Indeed he used to be joyful among his folk,
and he thought that he would never return.

rows.arabic: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًا
rows.translation: Yes, his Lord had been watching him.
rows.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīrā

rows.translation: I swear by the evening glow,
by the night and what it is fraught with,
by the moon when it blooms full:
you will surely fare from stage to stage.
What is the matter with them that they will not believe,

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
rows.translation: and will not prostrate when the Quran is recited to them?
rows.transliteration: wa idhā quri-a `alayhimul qur-ānu lā yasjudūn ۩

rows.translation: Indeed, the faithless impugn [the Apostle],
and Allah knows best what they keep to themselves.
So inform them of a painful punishment,

rows.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
rows.translation: excepting such as are faithful and do righteous deeds: for them there will be an everlasting reward.
rows.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn
